#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int z[5000005];
void getZarr(string str, int Z[])
{
    int n = str.length();
    int L, R, k;
 
    // [L,R] make a window which matches with prefix of s
    L = R = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++)
    {
        if (i > R)
        {
            L = R = i;
            while (R<n && str[R-L] == str[R])
                R++;
            Z[i] = R-L;
            R--;
        }
        else
        {
            k = i-L;
            if (Z[k] < R-i+1)
                 Z[i] = Z[k];
            else
            {
                L = i;
                while (R<n && str[R-L] == str[R])
                    R++;
                Z[i] = R-L;
                R--;
            }
        }
    }
}
long long int min(long long int x,long long int y){
    if(x>y)return y;
    return x;
}
int main(){
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    getZarr(s,z);
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    int l=s.length();
    while(n--){
        int x;
	scanf("%d",&x);
        printf("%d\n",min(z[x],x));
    }
}
